Hotel Name: Le Metropole Luxury Heritage Hotel Since 1902 by Paradise Inn Group
Review Title: A unique opportunity to stay in such a historical building, but it needs a general deep clean
Positive Review: The staff were excellent and it is certainly an experience to stay in such a heritage hotel. It is clearly a love letter to a bygone era and the term 'faded grandeur' summarises the hotel well. Our room was big, comfortable, with a lovely view of the corniche, and the location is excellent.
Negative Review: The rooftop bar has a great view, and this is where breakfast is served. The area is atmosopheric at night and is a nice place to sit for a drink. In the morning the place seemed less appealing, it is crowded with furniture leading to lots of dusty corners and places that are hard to keep clean.
Room Type: Golden Junior Suite Direct Sea View With Light Dinner

City Name: Le Metropole Luxury Heritage Hotel Since 1902 by Paradise Inn Group (Hotel), Alexandria (Egypt) Deals
Hotel Name: Le Metropole Luxury Heritage Hotel Since 1902 by Paradise Inn Group
Review Title: Beautiful hotel, immaculately managed, excellent value.
Positive Review:
A beautiful hotel, immaculately presented, with highly professional staff. We were so pleased to find this place.
Breakfast on the roof terrace was great, and our rate included a nice afternoon tea (named - strangely - 'light dinner' by the management).
Huge, comfortable bed, a lovely big room, and the most amazing antique Otis elevator still in service.
Highly recommended!
Room Type: Golden Junior Suite Direct Sea View With Light Dinner

Positive Review:
I recently stayed at the hotel and had a fantastic experience. The hotel itself was comfortable and well-maintained, but what really stood out was the exceptional honesty and friendliness of the staff and Mr.Maged . I accidentally left behind pieces of gold jewelry, and not only did the team quickly locate it, but they also reached out to inform me and arranged to keep it safe until I could retrieve it.
Their kindness and professionalism left a lasting impression, and I’m so grateful to them for going above and beyond. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for a place to stay with a trustworthy and caring team. Thank you to the staff for making my visit memorable for all the right reason.
Room Type: Deluxe Double Room with Sea View

Negative Review: I messaged the hotel prior to my stay to confirm that they did have a strong wifi connection as advertised as I needed to do some work during my stay. They assured me they had a good connection. However when I arrived I was unable to connect. The staff helped but then the connection was very poor. They said they would call someone to fix it but the issue wasn't resolved during my stay. Definitely not a huge problem as there was an excellent wifi connection at the Wave Cafe close by. It's just a little annoying as I'd messaged the property beforehand to ask about the connection and they assured me it was good.
